snippet: Israel acknowledged that it was providing humanitarian aid to victims of the civil war inside Syria, saying it has funneled food and other emergency supplies.
abstract: Israel acknowledges that it is providing humanitarian aid to victims of the civil war in Syria, saying it has funneled food and other emergency supplies to embattled villages across the frontier.
lead_paragraph: Israel acknowledged that it was providing humanitarian aid to victims of the civil war inside Syria, saying it has funneled food and other emergency supplies.

headline.main: Israel Sends Humanitarian Aid to Syria
headline.print_headline: Israel Sends Humanitarian Aid to Syria
